description.zh-cn: 中国药物化学家，中国中医科学院终身研究员兼首席研究员，青蒿素和双氢青蒿素的发现者。因其在抗疟药方面的贡献，于2015年获得诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: A Chinese pharmaceutical chemist, lifetime researcher and chief researcher at the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences, and the discoverer of artemisinin and dihydroartemisinin. She was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 2015 for her contributions to antimalarial drugs.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省下辖的副省级市，是屠呦呦的出生地。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Zhejiang Province, China, and the birthplace of Tu Youyou.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，屠呦呦的主要居住和工作地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, and the main place of residence and work for Tu Youyou.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家中医药管理局直属的集科研、医疗、教学为一体的综合性中医药研究机构。屠呦呦于此工作。
description.en: A comprehensive research institution for Chinese medicine directly under the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine of the People's Republic of China, integrating scientific research, medical care, and teaching. Tu Youyou works here.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学的医学教育机构，其前身为北京医学院。屠呦呦于1955年毕业于此。
description.en: The medical education institution of Peking University, formerly known as Beijing Medical College. Tu Youyou graduated from here in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江省宁波市的中学，屠呦呦曾于此就读。
description.en: A high school located in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, where Tu Youyou once studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江省宁波市的中学，屠呦呦于1951年于此毕业。
description.en: A high school located in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, from which Tu Youyou graduated in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 一种由屠呦呦及其团队发现的用于治疗疟疾的药物。
description.en: A drug used to treat malaria, discovered by Tu Youyou and her team.

description.zh-cn: 一种由屠呦呦及其团队发现的抗疟药。
description.en: An antimalarial drug discovered by Tu Youyou and her team.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦的丈夫，曾在北京钢铁研究院工作，教授级高级工程师。
description.en: Tu Youyou's husband, who worked at the Beijing Iron and Steel Research Institute as a professor-level senior engineer.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在研发抗疟药物的中华人民共和国国家秘密军事医学研究项目，屠呦呦是该项目研究组的组长，并在此期间发现了青蒿素。
description.en: A top-secret military medical research project of the People's Republic of China aimed at developing antimalarial drugs. Tu Youyou was the head of the project's research group and discovered artemisinin during this period.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理，组建了523项目。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who established Project 523.

description.zh-cn: 中国晋代医学家，其著作《肘后备急方》启发了屠呦呦发现青蒿素的方法。
description.en: A physician in the Jin Dynasty of China, whose work 'A Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergencies' inspired Tu Youyou's method for discovering artemisinin.

en: A Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergencies

description.zh-cn: 由晋代葛洪所著的医学典籍，其中关于青蒿的记载启发了屠呦呦。
description.en: A medical classic written by Ge Hong of the Jin Dynasty, whose record of Artemisia annua inspired Tu Youyou.

description.zh-cn: 中药学家，曾是屠呦呦在中医研究院的老师和同事。
description.en: A pharmacognosist who was Tu Youyou's teacher and colleague at the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 现任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理，在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后曾致函祝贺。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who sent a letter of congratulations after Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize.

description.zh-cn: 微软公司创始人，将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为2015年的好消息之一。
description.en: Founder of Microsoft Corporation, who listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of the good news stories of 2015.

description.zh-cn: 美国最高学术荣誉团体之一。
description.en: One of the highest academic honorary societies in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中国财政金融家，屠呦呦的舅舅。
description.en: A Chinese financier and banker, and Tu Youyou's maternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国财政部国库司首任司长，屠呦呦的外祖父。
description.en: The first Director of the National Treasury Department of the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of China, and Tu Youyou's maternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 清朝武官，湄云舰管带，屠呦呦的曾祖父。
description.en: A military officer of the Qing Dynasty, commander of the warship Meiyun, and Tu Youyou's great-grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 清朝生员，屠呦呦的祖父。
description.en: A Shengyuan of the Qing Dynasty, and Tu Youyou's grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的研究机构，屠呦呦的丈夫李廷钊曾在此工作。
description.en: A research institute in Beijing where Tu Youyou's husband, Li Tingzhao, worked.

description.zh-cn: 李廷钊是屠呦呦的丈夫。
description.en: Li Tingzhao is Tu Youyou's husband.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦出生于浙江宁波。
description.en: Tu Youyou was born in Ningbo, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于1981年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Tu Youyou joined the Communist Party of China in 1981.

position.zh-cn: 终身研究员兼首席研究员、中药研究所青蒿素研究中心主任、博士研究生导师
position.en: Lifetime Researcher and Chief Researcher, Director of the Artemisinin Research Center at the Institute of Chinese Materia Medica, Doctoral Supervisor

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦自1955年毕业后被分配至中医研究院（中国中医科学院前身）工作至今。
description.en: Since graduating in 1955, Tu Youyou has been assigned to work at the Institute of Traditional Chinese Medicine (the predecessor of the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences).

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于1951年考入北京大学医学院，1955年毕业于北京医学院（后并入北京大学医学部）。
description.en: Tu Youyou was admitted to Peking University Medical College in 1951 and graduated from Beijing Medical College (later merged into Peking University Health Science Center) in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于1948年进入效实中学学习。
description.en: Tu Youyou entered Xiaoshi High School to study in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于1950年转入宁波中学并于1951年毕业。
description.en: Tu Youyou transferred to Ningbo High School in 1950 and graduated in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 1969年1月，屠呦呦被任命为北京中药研究所523项目组的组长。
description.en: In January 1969, Tu Youyou was appointed as the leader of the Project 523 group at the Beijing Institute of Chinese Materia Medica.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦及其团队发现了抗疟药青蒿素。
description.en: Tu Youyou and her team discovered the antimalarial drug artemisinin.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦及其团队发现了抗疟药双氢青蒿素。
description.en: Tu Youyou and her team discovered the antimalarial drug dihydroartemisinin.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦在中医研究院工作初期，曾与老师楼之岑副教授一同研究中药。
description.en: In the early days of her work at the Institute of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Tu Youyou studied traditional Chinese medicine with her teacher, Associate Professor Lou Zhicen.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于2025年当选为美国国家科学院外籍院士。
description.en: Tu Youyou was elected as a foreign associate of the U.S. National Academy of Sciences in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 1969年，时任国务院总理的周恩来组建了523项目，旨在研发抗疟药物。
description.en: In 1969, then-Premier Zhou Enlai established Project 523 to develop antimalarial drugs.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦从葛洪的《肘后备急方》中关于“青蒿一握，以水二升渍，绞取汁，尽服之”的记载获得灵感，改用乙醚低温萃取，从而成功提取出青蒿素。
description.en: Tu Youyou was inspired by the record in Ge Hong's 'A Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergencies' which stated 'a handful of sweet wormwood, steeped in two sheng of water, wring out the juice, and drink it all'. This led her to switch to low-temperature extraction with ether, successfully extracting artemisinin.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院于2017年1月9日将2016年度国家最高科学技术奖授予屠呦呦。
description.en: The State Council of the People's Republic of China awarded the 2016 State Preeminent Science and Technology Award to Tu Youyou on January 9, 2017.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席习近平于2019年9月17日授予屠呦呦共和国勋章。
description.en: On September 17, 2019, President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping awarded Tu Youyou the Medal of the Republic.

description.zh-cn: 在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后，时任国务院总理李克强致函表示祝贺，推动了对她的认可。
description.en: After Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize, then-Premier Li Keqiang sent a congratulatory letter, promoting her recognition.

description.zh-cn: 微软创始人比尔·盖茨将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为“2015年6大好消息”之一，提升了其国际声誉。
description.en: Microsoft founder Bill Gates listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of 'The Top 6 Good-News Stories of 2015', enhancing her international reputation.

description.zh-cn: 姚庆三是屠呦呦的舅舅，屠呦呦幼年曾居住于其家中。
description.en: Yao Qingsan is Tu Youyou's maternal uncle. Tu Youyou lived in his home during her childhood.

description.zh-cn: 姚咏白是屠呦呦的外祖父。
description.en: Yao Yongbai is Tu Youyou's maternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 屠宗年是屠呦呦的曾祖父。
description.en: Tu Zongnian is Tu Youyou's great-grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 屠用悆是屠呦呦的祖父。
description.en: Tu Yongyu is Tu Youyou's grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 李廷钊在北京的钢铁研究院工作。
description.en: Li Tingzhao worked at the Iron and Steel Research Institute in Beijing.
